items.sentence: Tom seemed convinced that Mary had to do that.
Tom says he won't ask Mary to do that anymore.
Tom says he still can't believe Mary did that.
Tom says he hopes Mary doesn't try to do that.
Tom says he hopes Mary can do that by herself.
Tom says he expects Mary to do that on Monday.
Tom doesn't know he's not supposed to do that.
Tom doesn't know he shouldn't do that anymore.
Tom didn't tell me whether or not he did that.
Tom doesn't know the first thing about Boston.
